s1_title: Wi-Fi Enabled Smart Light Switch-Two Gang
s1_text: Control your home from anywhere. Set idyllic scenes and have additional devices work in unison. Monitor the power consumption anytime. Enjoy the convenience of connected lighting easily.
s2_title: Create Scenes to Quickly Control Multiple Accessories
s2_text: Create a scene to control multiple HomeKit-enabled accessories at the same time. Tap the scene to turn it on or off, or just ask Siri.
s3_text: Responds to Siri, which allows you to control your smart home directly, just by using your voice.
s4_text: You can set up your HomePod, Apple TV 4K, Apple TV (4th generation), or iPad as a home hub, then you can control connected devices from anywhere. Never return to a dark home.
s5_text: Check real-time total power consumption and monitor daily and monthly total electric power consumption via the Koogeek Home app on your iOS devices.
s6_text: Custom schedules and set timers, let your lights function automatically. On at sunset, off at bedtime. Or whenever else meet your daily routine.
s7_text: Support up to 30,000 times of physically on/off switching and work up to 10 years. Enable you to enjoy the benefits of the smart home technology while giving you peace of mind.
s8_icon1: The switch will automatically cut off when the internal temperature reaches 85°C or the current is over 12A.
s8_icon2: The built-in protect circuit can prevent surge current and ensure the regular and reliable operation of the switch.
s8_icon3: Provide advanced security with end-to-end encryption and authentication between a HomeKit-enabled accessory and your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch.
s9_text: Adopt V-0 grade flame-retardant PC panel, fireproof. Adopt the industrial-grade IOT chip with low-power consumption from 0.7W to 1W. Save energy and reduce your electricity bill!
s10_text: TIPS: This is an electrical shock hazard. Please call a professional electrician if you are unfamiliar or uncomfortable with electrical work.
s11_title: Find the Option Most Fits You
